elements.name: When a POST request with valid authorization information, correct 'id', and valid data (name)
elements.description:
is sent to the api/categories/update/{{id}} endpoint, the returned status code should be 200, and the
  message in the response body should be verified as "Category updated successfully"

steps.name: The API user sets "api/categories/update/46" path parameters
The API user prepares a POST request containing the name data to send to the api categories update endpoint
The API user records the response from the api categories update endpoint with valid authorization information
The API user verifies that the status code is 200

name: As an administrator, I want to update the existing category information via API connection.
